title: In the Laird's Bed
description: A deadly storm brings Duncan the Brave back to Cristiana Domhnaill's home, but the Highland laird is seeking more than shelter….As their rekindled passion for each other heats up the long winter nights, Duncan is sure he can win Cristiana back and forge a much-needed alliance between their families.But Cristiana is no longer the girl she was, and hidden secrets are about to be revealed….
author: Joanne Rock
